statements: SELECT * FROM book_popularity WHERE publication_year > 2000;
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score FROM book_popularity WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT popularity_score FROM book_popularity WHERE genre_name = 'Mystery' AND publication_year < 2010;
SELECT genre_name, publication_year FROM book_popularity ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM book_popularity;
SELECT * FROM book_popularity WHERE publication_year > 2000 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT genre_name, AVG(popularity_score) AS avg_popularity FROM book_popularity GROUP BY genre_name HAVING AVG(popularity_score) > 8;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name, publication_year FROM book_popularity WHERE popularity_score >= 9 ORDER BY publication_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM book_popularity WHERE genre_name LIKE 'Fiction%' OR genre_name LIKE 'Mystery%';
SELECT DISTINCT genre_name FROM book_popularity ORDER BY genre_name ASC;
SELECT id, title, genre, publication_year FROM books;
SELECT title, genre, id, publication_year FROM books;
SELECT genre, title, id, publication_year FROM books WHERE publication_year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre='Mystery' OR genre='Thriller';
SELECT id, title, publication_year FROM books WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM books WHERE publication_year = 2020 ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT id, title, publication_year FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, publication_year FROM books WHERE genre IN ('Fiction', 'Romance') ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT id, title, genre, publication_year FROM books WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY publication_year DESC, genre ASC;
SELECT genre, AVG(popularity_score) AS avg_score FROM genre_popularity GROUP BY genre HAVING avg_score > 5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM book_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name FROM book_genres WHERE genre_name = 'Horror';
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score FROM book_genres JOIN popularity_data ON book_genres.genre_id = popularity_data.genre_id;
SELECT data_timestamp, data_value FROM analytics_data WHERE genre_id = 2 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score FROM book_genres JOIN popularity_data ON book_genres.genre_id = popularity_data.genre_id WHERE popularity_score > 50;
SELECT genre_name FROM book_genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM popularity_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score, timestamp FROM book_genres INNER JOIN popularity_data ON book_genres.genre_id = popularity_data.genre_id;
SELECT analytics_id, genre_id, data_value, data_timestamp FROM analytics_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC;

SELECT genre_name, SUM(popularity_score) AS total_popularity FROM book_genres INNER JOIN popularity_data ON book_genres.genre_id = popularity_data.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name HAVING total_popularity > 500;
SELECT * FROM book_genres;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM book_genres ORDER BY genre_name ASC;
SELECT genre_id, popularity_score FROM popularity WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name, sales_count FROM sales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(analytics_value) AS avg_analytics_value, MIN(analytics_value) AS min_analytics_value, MAX(analytics_value) AS max_analytics_value FROM analytics;
SELECT * FROM book_genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM book_genres WHERE genre_id = 3;
SELECT genre_name, popularity_score, popularity_date FROM popularity ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT genre_name, sales_count, sales_date FROM sales WHERE genre_id = 1 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT genre_name, analytics_value FROM analytics WHERE analytics_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM book_genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_id FROM book_genres WHERE genre_id = 2;
SELECT book_title, genre_name FROM books JOIN book_genres ON books.genre_id = book_genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM popularity_data ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT book_title, author_name FROM books JOIN book_authors ON books.book_id = book_authors.book_id JOIN author ON book_authors.author_id = author.author_id;
SELECT * FROM book_genres;
SELECT book_id, book_title, genre_name FROM books JOIN book_genres ON books.genre_id = book_genres.genre_id;
SELECT book_id, book_title, author_name FROM books JOIN book_authors ON books.book_id = book_authors.book_id JOIN author ON book_authors.author_id = author.author_id;
SELECT book_title, popularity_score, timestamp FROM books JOIN popularity_data ON books.genre_id = popularity_data.genre_id;
SELECT genre_name, AVG(popularity_score) as avg_popularity FROM book_genres JOIN popularity_data ON book_genres.genre_id = popularity_data.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name;
